$comment: Single source of truth for all version numbers in the Swictation project
_distribution_comment: Main npm package version - this is the user-facing version for swictation, @agidreams/linux-x64, and @agidreams/darwin-arm64. All three packages MUST have the same version.

components._comment: Component versions are extracted from Cargo.toml files. These can evolve independently from the distribution version.

daemon.description: Main daemon binary that handles voice recognition and text injection

ui.description: Tauri-based UI application for configuration and monitoring

libraries._comment: Third-party library versions. These are external dependencies.

onnxruntime._comment: macOS uses 1.22.0 due to ORT 1.23.x regression with external data + CoreML. Linux GPU uses 1.23.2 for CUDA 12.9 support.

cuda._comment: CUDA version for modern GPUs (Turing, Ampere, Ada, Hopper). Legacy GPUs use CUDA 11.8.

cudnn._comment: cuDNN version for CUDA 12.9. Legacy uses cuDNN compatible with CUDA 11.8.

metadata._comment: Build metadata - updated automatically by build scripts
